title: Katie Price's ex Charles Drury throws shade with X-rated Instagram
text:
Katie Price’s ex Charles Drury has been proving he’s not a ‘little boy’ on Instagram (Picture: Instagram)

Katie Price’s ex boyfriend Charles Drury won’t stand for being called a ‘little boy’ and he’s getting X-rated on Instagram to prove it.

The 22-year-old briefly dated Katie at the end of August, following her split from Kris Boyson.

He had moved in with her during their whirlwind romance, but they called it quits when rumours surfaced claiming Katie had cheated on him with her ex, Kris.

Charles claimed to The Sun that while he was with Katie, Kris had turned up at her house with five of his friends, threatening him and calling him a ‘little boy’.

But clapping back at Chris, Charles decided to strip off to his boxers and flaunt his, ahem, rather large bulge.

We’re not quite sure where to look, you?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Pulling at his Calvin Klein boxers, Charles threw out a few digs of his own.

He captioned his half-naked Instagram post: ‘Another session done, ready for the weekend. What’s everyone up to? #littleboy #really #youwasntsayingthat.’

And it’s not just Kris he’s been taking aim at, as Charles recently threw shade at Katie by branding her ‘lazy’ and a ‘one out of 10 in the bedroom’.

Katie briefly dated Charles following her split from ex Kris Boyson (Picture: Instagram)

‘For any lad, it’s like a dream come true, but it wasn’t anything to brag about to my mates,’ he said. ‘I thought it was going to be better than what I expected.

‘I was disappointed. The whole expectation of her being Katie Price – this glamour model – you’re thinking it’s going to be amazing but then it’s an anti-climax.’

Ouch.

Katie’s reps responded to Charles’ comments and told The Mirror: ‘Given what she now knows about him it was inevitable he would sell a story to try to publicise himself.

‘Kris and Kate are over Charles who is behaving like the little boy he is.’
